title: Fragment, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: two integrated structures, 2/1 twill and plain weave
description: Swan with a flower in its beak wearing a collar and chained to a sunburst. The swan is in repeat and faces alternately in different directions in different rows. All in white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk
Technique: two integrated structures, 2/1 twill and plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-532.
